item.title: Report X-2024051623
item.description:
Report X-2024051623

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-07T18:15:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-22
  • City: HENRIETTA
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED FOR LEAKER THAT WAS WET FROM BOTTOM ON THE PURPLE BELT. RESPONDER RESPONDED IN FULL PPE. WHEN ARRIVING ON SCENE, SAW THE LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE FLOOR IN A UPS TOTE. RESPONDED TOOK THE PACKAGE BACK TO THE HAZMAT CAGE FOR PROCESSING AND DISCOVERED THE BOTTOM WAS WET, AFTER INSPECTING THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING FROM A FUME VENT IN THE CAP.
